title: Accessibility Statement
subtitle: ABD RAG Platform's commitment to universal inclusion.
commitment_p1: Our mission is to democratize access to high-precision documentary intelligence, ensuring our platform is usable by everyone, regardless of their capabilities.
commitment_p2: We strive to comply with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA at a minimum, actively working to achieve higher standards.
f1_desc: The entire interface is operable through logical keyboard shortcuts.
f2_desc: Rigorous use of HTML5 tags for a clear information hierarchy.
f3_desc: Color palettes optimized for maximum readability.
contact_desc: If you encounter any accessibility barrier, please inform us to correct it immediately.
